title: (x) Domaine de Canton slender slab serif - Argent (custom face by Josh Darden) {Jesse Arneson (self)}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415214008im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DOMAINE_5297.jpg)

Anyone know what face this is? Bureau Agency-esque but not the same. Sorry for the low quality but I couldn’t find it any larger.

From a Mucca designed website at [www.domainedecanton.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415214008/http:/www.domainedecanton.com/ "www.domainedecanton.com").

Thanks so much!

 [‹ (x) "Pop psychology" simple straight-sided sans - T-STAR Mono Round {Angel}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415214008/http:/typophile.com/node/44133 "Go to previous forum topic") ["Time Warner anniversary" handwritten script ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415214008/http:/typophile.com/node/44137 "Go to next forum topic")
author: et al.

comments.content: Mucca does a lot of their own type, so I wouldn’t be surprised if this is unavailable on the retail market. It has some similarities to [Grand Canyon](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415214008/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/red_rooster/grand_canyon/?sample_text=INDOCHINE&sample_size=144) and [Constructa](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415214008/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/constructa/?sample_text=INDOCHINE&sample_size=96)
Don’t forget to add the condensed versions of [United Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415214008/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/house_industries/united_serif/) to your list. :)

I just found out through a friend of a friend who works at Mucca that the typeface is Argent, designed by Joshua Darden and not available to buy yet. Arghhh!

Thanks for the reminder on the United family Yves...it’s a great one!
